share_icon_tip.message: Tip: {{btn@share:Standard Icon}} helps to improve the chance of sharing approval

icon_specification_detail.message:
1. Sharing icon requires confirming safety area (following the official recommended ratio will increase the chance of approval) 
2. The shared icon is recommended to have a size of 300px, resolutionâ‰¥72dpi
3. The shared icon cannot contain inappropriate motifs (politics, pornography, etc.) 
4. The official recommendation for shared icons is to use a pure color background
